messages.subject: Want to be published???
messages.msgSnippet: Click here: Homeschooling Reflections/book/unschooling/5 kids learn at home for 20+years Hi, In an
messages.messageBody:
<A HREF="http://www.homeschoolingreflections.com/">Click here: Homeschooling Reflections/book/unschooling/5 kids learn at home
for 20+years</A>

Hi,

In an effort to compile material for my next publishing efforts, I need your
help.  If you'd like to share some of your un/homeschooling story but don't
wish to write an entire book perhaps you'd like to contribute to my future
projects.

I'm looking for stories from other families to share. Please let me know what
has worked for you and your children.  Your Stories:  Submit your story for
inclusion in further publications:

1. Deciding to Homeschool/your family's style of homelearning
2. Tales from homeschooling the younger children (grade school age)
3. Tales from homeschooling high school age students
4. Young adults who have learned at home - telling how are they making their
way in the world now- by either the young person, or the parent.


Be sure to give your contact information: name, e-mail, phone, mailing
address.

See the website - www.homeschoolingreflections.com, under the page "submit
your story" for snail mail, and e-mail addresses.

Thanks so much,
Connie Colten



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
